subject: Simsonn Plus X - Does it include tax?
description_text:
Hi, Im purchasing the Simsonn Plus X 

Do they already include tax on the price? Would it be possible to get an invoice on the product with a different description? Something like PC components? 

Kind regards

conversations.body_text: Hi Oliver Okland,    May I ask which country you are placing your order from? We have warehouses in Germany and the United States, so no additional customs duties are required.

Good afternoon 

It is to Spain so I think that there are no custom duties. However my question is if the price already includes tax? Is the price already with the 21% VAT that Spain has? 

Would it be possible to create a custom invoice with the description - “PC components” 

Kind regards 

>
Hi Oliver Okland,    Our prices are exclusive of tax. If you require tax-inclusive pricing, we can arrange that for you.
